Description:
Detects PowerShell command line contents that include a suspicious abnormal casing in the Net.Webclient (e.g. nEt.WEbCliEnT) string as used in obfuscation techniques

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Net WebClient Casing Anomalies
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((process_path like '%\powershell.exe' or process_path like '%\pwsh.exe') and (original_file_name = 'PowerShell.EXE' or original_file_name = 'pwsh.dll')) and (command like '%TgBlAFQALgB3AEUAQg%' or command like '%4AZQBUAC4AdwBFAEIA%' or command like '%OAGUAVAAuAHcARQBCA%' or command like '%bgBFAHQALgB3AGUAYg%' or command like '%4ARQB0AC4AdwBlAGIA%' or command like '%uAEUAdAAuAHcAZQBiA%' or command like '%TgBFAHQALgB3AGUAYg%' or command like '%OAEUAdAAuAHcAZQBiA%' or command like '%bgBlAFQALgB3AGUAYg%' or command like '%4AZQBUAC4AdwBlAGIA%' or command like '%uAGUAVAAuAHcAZQBiA%' or command like '%TgBlAFQALgB3AGUAYg%' or command like '%OAGUAVAAuAHcAZQBiA%' or command like '%bgBFAFQALgB3AGUAYg%' or command like '%4ARQBUAC4AdwBlAGIA%' or command like '%uAEUAVAAuAHcAZQBiA%' or command like '%bgBlAHQALgBXAGUAYg%' or command like '%4AZQB0AC4AVwBlAGIA%' or command like '%uAGUAdAAuAFcAZQBiA%' or command like '%bgBFAFQALgBXAGUAYg%' or command like '%4ARQBUAC4AVwBlAGIA%' or command like '%uAEUAVAAuAFcAZQBiA%' or command like '%bgBlAHQALgB3AEUAYg%' or command like '%4AZQB0AC4AdwBFAGIA%' or
